seo.title: Safety & Medical Disclaimer | Rootwise Wellness Information Only
seo.description: Rootwise provides general wellness and nutrition information only. Not medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always consult healthcare professionals.

disclaimer.content:
Safety & Medical Disclaimer

We care deeply about your safety and wellbeing. Please read this carefully before using Rootwise.

Rootwise Is Educational Information Only

Rootwise provides general wellness and nutrition information only. The content, suggestions, and guidance you receive through Rootwise are for educational purposes and are not intended to:

  • Diagnose any medical condition, disease, or health concern
  • Treat, cure, or prevent any illness or medical condition
  • Replace professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment
  • Act as a substitute for consultation with qualified healthcare professionals

Not a Medical Device or Medical Service

Rootwise is not a medical device, not a diagnostic tool, and not a medical service. We are a wellness information platform that uses AI to help you explore foods, herbs, daily habits, and routines that may support general wellbeing.

Always Consult Healthcare Professionals

Before making any changes to your diet, lifestyle, supplements, or health routines:

  • Speak with your doctor, nurse practitioner, or qualified healthcare provider
  • Discuss any new foods, herbs, or supplements—especially if you have existing health conditions
  • Never disregard professional medical advice or delay seeking it because of something you read on Rootwise
  • If you have concerns about your health, always seek guidance from licensed healthcare professionals

Emergency Disclaimer

In an emergency, call your local emergency services immediately. Rootwise is not for urgent or emergency situations. If you experience sudden, severe symptoms—chest pain, difficulty breathing, severe bleeding, loss of consciousness, signs of stroke, or any life-threatening condition—contact emergency services without delay.

Individual Variation & Personalization

Everyone's body is different. The information Rootwise provides:

  • Is general in nature and may not be suitable for your specific circumstances
  • Cannot account for all individual health conditions, medications, allergies, or genetic factors
  • Should be adapted to your unique needs with guidance from healthcare professionals

Allergies, Medications & Interactions

Rootwise cannot predict all potential allergies, sensitivities, or interactions between foods, herbs, and medications. You are responsible for:

  • Knowing your own allergies and intolerances
  • Checking with your doctor or pharmacist about interactions with medications you take
  • Avoiding any foods, herbs, or practices that you know are unsafe for you

Common examples: grapefruit interacts with many medications; St. John's Wort affects certain drugs; people with thyroid conditions should be cautious with certain herbs.

Red Flags & When to Seek Medical Care

Rootwise includes safety notes and red-flag warnings in every plan. These are reminders of symptoms that require professional evaluation. If you experience any red-flag symptoms, stop self-care experiments and consult a healthcare provider immediately.

Examples include: sudden severe pain, vision changes, difficulty breathing, unexplained weight loss, persistent fever, blood in stool or urine, neurological symptoms, or any symptom that worries you.

Use at Your Own Discretion

By using Rootwise, you acknowledge that:

  • You are choosing to explore wellness information voluntarily
  • You understand the educational nature of the content
  • You will exercise your own judgment and seek professional advice when needed
  • Rootwise cannot guarantee results, safety, or suitability for your situation

AI-Generated Content

Rootwise uses artificial intelligence to generate personalized wellness content. While we strive for accuracy and safety, AI systems:

  • May occasionally produce incomplete or inaccurate information
  • Cannot replace human clinical judgment
  • Should be viewed as a starting point for further research and professional consultation

No Warranties or Guarantees

Rootwise provides information "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee:

  • Specific health outcomes or improvements
  • Complete accuracy or suitability of all content
  • That information will always be up-to-date with the latest research

Pregnant, Nursing, or Planning Pregnancy

If you are pregnant, nursing, or planning to become pregnant, consult your obstetrician or midwife before trying any new foods, herbs, supplements, or wellness practices. Many herbs and supplements are not safe during pregnancy or breastfeeding.

Children & Minors

Rootwise is designed for adults. If considering wellness suggestions for children or teenagers, always consult a pediatrician or family doctor first. Children have different nutritional needs and sensitivities.

Limitation of Liability

To the fullest extent permitted by law, Rootwise, its creators, operators, and affiliates shall not be liable for any injury, illness, adverse reaction, or harm arising from your use of the information provided. You assume all risks associated with implementing any suggestions.

International Use

Rootwise is accessible globally. However, food safety regulations, herb availability, and healthcare systems vary by country. The information may not comply with all local regulations or cultural practices. Always verify suitability and legality in your region.

Changes to This Disclaimer

We may update this disclaimer periodically. Continued use of Rootwise after changes constitutes acceptance of the updated terms.

Questions or Concerns?

If you have questions about this disclaimer or Rootwise's safety practices, please contact us at safety@rootwise.example.

Remember: Rootwise is here to support your wellness journey with gentle, educational information—but your healthcare team is your primary resource for medical decisions. We encourage partnership with professionals, not replacement.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy

seo.title: Privacy Policy | How Rootwise Protects Your Data
seo.description: Learn how Rootwise collects, uses, and protects your wellness information. GDPR-compliant, transparent, privacy-first practices.

privacy.content:
Privacy Policy

Your privacy matters deeply to us. This Privacy Policy explains how Rootwise collects, uses, protects, and respects your personal information.

Last Updated: [Date]

1. Introduction

Rootwise is committed to transparency and user privacy. We collect only the data necessary to provide you with personalized wellness guidance, and we never sell your personal information to third parties.

2. Data We Collect

2.1 Information You Provide Directly

When you use Rootwise, you may share:

  • Account Information: Email address, username, password
  • Wellness Input: Symptoms, goals, mood descriptions, daily habits, preferences
  • Body Profile: Dietary preferences (vegetarian, gluten-free, etc.), clinical watchouts (diabetes, thyroid conditions, etc.), medication notes, allergy information, preferred languages
  • Session Data: Conversational entries, questions you ask, plans generated

Note: This is wellness information you choose to share for personalization—it is not a medical record.

2.2 Data Collected Automatically

  • Technical Data: IP address, browser type, device information, operating system
  • Usage Data: Pages visited, features used, time spent, interaction patterns
  • Cookies & Trackers: Session cookies, analytics cookies (see Cookie Notice)

3. How We Use Your Data

We use your information to:

  • Provide the Service: Generate personalized wellness plans, remember your preferences, tailor suggestions
  • Improve Rootwise: Analyze usage patterns, train and improve AI models, fix bugs, enhance user experience
  • Communicate: Send service updates, safety notices, feature announcements (you can opt out of marketing emails)
  • Safety & Compliance: Monitor for abuse, prevent fraud, comply with legal obligations

4. AI Processing & Machine Learning

Rootwise uses artificial intelligence (AI) to:

  • Interpret your conversational input
  • Generate personalized wellness content
  • Surface relevant suggestions based on your profile

How it works: Your text inputs are processed by AI models (which may include third-party services) to create responses. We anonymize and aggregate data when training or improving models. Your individual wellness details are not shared publicly or sold.

5. Data Sharing & Disclosure

5.1 We Do NOT Sell Your Data

Rootwise does not sell, rent, or trade your personal information to third parties for marketing purposes.

5.2 When We May Share Data

  • Service Providers: Trusted third parties who help us operate Rootwise (cloud hosting, analytics, AI processing). These providers are bound by confidentiality agreements.
  • Legal Requirements: If required by law, court order, or government request
  • Safety & Harm Prevention: To protect users, prevent fraud, or address security threats
  • Business Transfers: If Rootwise is acquired or merged, your data may transfer to the new entity (you will be notified)

6. Cookies & Tracking Technologies

Rootwise uses cookies to:

  • Essential Cookies: Enable core functionality (authentication, session management)
  • Analytics Cookies: Understand how users interact with Rootwise (e.g., Google Analytics)
  • Preference Cookies: Remember your settings and language choices

You can manage cookie preferences in your browser settings. See our Cookie Notice for details.

7. Data Security

We implement reasonable security measures to protect your data, including:

  • Encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS)
  • Secure password hashing
  • Access controls and authentication
  • Regular security audits

However, no system is 100% secure. Use Rootwise at your own discretion and protect your account credentials.

8. Data Retention

We retain your data for as long as:

  • Your account is active
  • Needed to provide services
  • Required by law

You can request deletion at any time (see "Your Rights" below).

9. Your Privacy Rights (GDPR & Beyond)

You have the right to:

  • Access: Request a copy of your personal data
  • Rectify: Correct inaccurate or incomplete information
  • Delete: Request deletion of your account and data ("right to be forgotten")
  • Portability: Export your data in a machine-readable format
  • Restrict Processing: Limit how we use your data
  • Object: Opt out of certain data processing activities
  • Withdraw Consent: Revoke consent for data processing at any time

To exercise these rights, contact us at privacy@rootwise.example.

10. International Data Transfers

Rootwise may process data in regions outside your country. We use standard contractual clauses and comply with applicable data protection laws to ensure your information remains protected.

11. Children's Privacy

Rootwise is not intended for children under 18. We do not knowingly collect data from minors. If you believe a child has provided information, contact us immediately to remove it.

12. Third-Party Links

Rootwise may link to external websites or services. We are not responsible for their privacy practices. Review their policies before sharing information.

13. Changes to This Privacy Policy

We may update this Privacy Policy periodically. We will notify you of significant changes via email or in-app notice. Continued use after changes constitutes acceptance.

14. Contact Us

For privacy questions, data requests, or concerns, contact:

  • Email: privacy@rootwise.example
  • Data Protection Officer: dpo@rootwise.example

Your trust is everything to us. We're committed to handling your wellness data with the utmost care, transparency, and respect.

cookies.title: Cookie Notice

seo.title: Cookie Notice | Rootwise Cookie Policy
seo.description: How Rootwise uses cookies for functionality, analytics, and preferences. Manage your cookie settings.

cookies.content:
Cookie Notice

Rootwise uses cookies and similar technologies to make your experience smooth, personalized, and secure. Here's what you need to know.

What Are Cookies?

Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help us recognize you, remember your preferences, and understand how you use Rootwise.

Types of Cookies We Use

1. Essential Cookies (Always Active)

These cookies are necessary for Rootwise to function. They enable:

  • Account authentication and login
  • Session management
  • Security features

You cannot disable these as they are required for the service to work.

2. Functional Cookies

These cookies remember your preferences:

  • Language selection
  • Theme or display settings
  • Previously entered wellness preferences

You can disable these, but it may affect your experience.

3. Analytics Cookies

We use analytics tools (like Google Analytics) to understand:

  • How users navigate Rootwise
  • Which features are most helpful
  • Where improvements are needed

This data is aggregated and anonymous. You can opt out of analytics cookies.

4. Marketing Cookies (If Applicable)

If we introduce marketing cookies in the future, we will ask for your explicit consent. Currently, Rootwise does not use third-party advertising cookies.

Third-Party Cookies

Some third-party services (like analytics providers) may set their own cookies. We carefully vet partners, but we do not control their cookies. Review their privacy policies for details.

How to Manage Cookies

In Your Browser

You can control cookies through your browser settings:

  • Chrome: Settings → Privacy and Security → Cookies
  • Firefox: Settings → Privacy & Security → Cookies and Site Data
  • Safari: Preferences → Privacy → Cookies
  • Edge: Settings → Privacy, Search, and Services → Cookies

In Rootwise

You can manage non-essential cookies in your Account Settings → Privacy Preferences.

Opt Out of Analytics

  • Google Analytics: Browser Add-on

Do Not Track (DNT)

We respect Do Not Track signals. If your browser sends a DNT signal, we will honor it for analytics cookies where possible.

Changes to This Cookie Notice

We may update this Cookie Notice periodically. Changes will be posted here with a new "Last Updated" date.

Questions?

For questions about cookies or privacy, contact us at privacy@rootwise.example.

We believe in transparency. Cookies help us serve you better—but you stay in control.
